name: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio: Neko Girls
name_original: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio: Neko Girls
description:
WELCOME TO THE SEXY WORLD OF THE NEKO GIRLS!


We all like girls with unique beauty, right? We specially love those that have a feline air in their movements and their way of acting. If that's your case (and I know it is!), you'll love what our Photographer has prepared. She brought together five of the hottest Neko Girls you've ever seen in a shoot full of sensuality, liquids and fur inside a charming cabaret in town. Complete the puzzles to access increasingly exciting scenes and make your way to a delicious sleepover with the five Neko Girls!

UNIQUE HOT HENTAI NEKO GIRLS:


  • ANELIS, THE PERSIAN CAT: She’s a super talented feline. She dances, sings, acts, plays the piano and even has a PhD in Archeology! She’s in the dressing room of the famous Studio Rouge cabaret, getting ready for her next show that starts soon. The Persian Cat LOVES being watched...


  • BAHALYA, THE BOMBAY CAT: She’s her own cat. Confident, intelligent, well-resolved and with a bright future ahead of her, she doesn't insist on giving an account of her life to anyone. She’s a young accounting student who has been planning her financial future since the age of 10.


  • CASTIANE, THE ABYSSINIAN CAT: She’s a star of the oriental dances! She’s a charismatic, attractive young woman with an ego the size of her talent. Her goal is to dance in the biggest concert halls in the world and make a president ejaculate when he sees one of her performances.


  • KALLECTRA, THE ARCHANGEL BLUE CAT: She’s responsible for keeping Studio Rouge up and running. But despite her servant outfit, she is much more than that. The Blue Cat is nothing less than the heiress and sole owner of the famous cabaret of exotic attractions.


  • NAZALA, THE SIAMESE CAT: She’s a rather difficult feline to deal with. She is spoiled, has refined tastes, enormous talent and a stunning beauty. No wonder she considers herself the biggest star of Studio Rouge and doesn't get along with any of the other girls.


  • PUSSYCAT GANG: The Neko Girls gathered together in one of Studio Rouge's premium rooms to celebrate the success of the photoshoot in the best way possible: with a delicious sleepover!

GAME FEATURES:

  • Five hot hentai Neko Girls with distinctive looks and unique personalities!
  • A delicious Pussycat Gang scene where all Neko Girls participate!
  • Finish all levels of each girl and give them some sticky love.
  • We have five cute cats for you to love!
  • Unique holidays costumes for each girl!
  • Customize your experience and difficulty level at will!
  • See all girls that you have unlocked in one place!
  • Original music with a lo-fi feel!
  • Sexy sound effects recorded by a real voice actress!
  • Multiple achievements!
  • Extra content in free updates!
